classes.description: Learn to play the piano with expert guidance from John Smith in this beginner-level class. No prior experience required.
Take your guitar skills to the next level with Emily Johnson in this intermediate-level class. Perfect for those with some experience.
Enhance your violin techniques and explore advanced repertoire under the guidance of Sarah Davis. This class is suitable for experienced violinists.
Discover the art of singing and improve your vocal skills with Michael Thompson in this intermediate-level class. Suitable for aspiring singers.
Learn the basics of drumming with David Wilson in this beginner-level class. No prior drumming experience required.
Deepen your understanding of music theory concepts and expand your compositional skills with Jennifer Lee in this intermediate-level class.
